questions.question: Is the application free?
questions.answer: Yes, the application is completely free to use.

questions.question: How do I add a new vehicle?
questions.answer: In the main menu, select 'My Vehicles' and then select 'Add Vehicle'. Fill in the required vehicle data (make, model) and click 'Add Vehicle'.

questions.question: How do I record fuel consumption?
questions.answer: Click on the desired vehicle in the 'My Vehicles' menu, then select 'Fill-up +'. Enter the fill-up date, amount of fuel added, total fill-up cost, and odometer reading. The application will automatically calculate consumption when at least two fill-ups are entered.

questions.question: How do I record electricity consumption?
questions.answer: Click on the desired vehicle in the 'My Vehicles' menu, then select 'Charging +'. Enter the charging date, amount of electrical energy, total charging cost, and odometer reading. The application will automatically calculate consumption when at least two charging sessions are entered.

questions.question: Can I add multiple vehicles?
questions.answer: Yes, you can add multiple vehicles. In the 'My Vehicles' menu, you can add a new vehicle using the same procedure as for the first vehicle.

questions.question: Can I use the application if my vehicle is a plug-in hybrid (PHEV)?
questions.answer: Yes, you can use the application for plug-in hybrids as well. In the 'My Vehicles' menu, you can add your hybrid vehicle using the same procedure as for a gasoline vehicle.

questions.question: Do my data sync between devices?
questions.answer: Yes, all your data is synchronized. This means you have access to your data on all devices where you are logged in.

questions.question: How do I delete my account?
questions.answer: You can delete your account directly from the app. Go to Settings > My Account and scroll down to find the 'Delete Account' option. This will permanently delete all your data and cannot be undone.

questions.question: How does fuel consumption calculation work?
questions.answer: The application calculates consumption based on the difference in kilometers between fill-ups and the amount of fuel added. The formula is: (liters / difference in kilometers) * 100.

questions.question: How does electricity consumption calculation work?
questions.answer: The application calculates consumption based on the difference in kilometers between charging sessions and the amount of electrical energy. The formula is: (kWh / difference in kilometers) * 100.

questions.question: Can I export my data?
questions.answer: This feature is not currently available. We are planning to add the option to export data in CSV format in the future.

sections.content:
The developer does not guarantee the complete accuracy of displayed data (fuel prices, locations, opening hours).
The developer is not responsible for any damage that may occur due to the use of the application.

sections.title: 4. Developer Rights
sections.content: The developer may anonymously analyze data to improve the application.

sections.title: 5. Termination of Use
sections.content:
Users may delete their user account at any time directly from the app. Go to Settings > My Account and select 'Delete Account'. You can also contact us at: enej.dev@gmail.com.

With account deletion, all personal data is permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

sections.title: 6. Applicable Law
sections.content:
Slovenian law applies to all potential disputes.
Slovenian courts have jurisdiction.

sections.title: 7. Age Restrictions
sections.content: The application is intended for users over 18 years of age.

sections.content:

sections.title: 2. Application Purpose
sections.content: "DriveTrack Pro" enables users to track fuel or electricity consumption of their vehicles.

sections.title: 3. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
bulletPoints: Vehicle data (make, model, license plate number)

subsections.title: Legal Basis for Processing:
subsections.content: User consent when registering an account.

subsections.title: Third-Party Processing:
subsections.content: We use Google's Firebase service for authentication and data storage.

subsections.title: Data Retention Period:
subsections.content: We store your data until your user account is deleted or a maximum of 6 months after account deletion.

subsections.title: Your Rights:
bulletPoints: Right to delete data ("right to be forgotten")
subsections.content: To exercise your rights, contact us at the email address above.

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Analytics
sections.content:
The application uses Google Analytics for Firebase to collect anonymous usage data. The purpose is solely to analyze application usage.
Cookies cannot be disabled within the application.

sections.title: 5. Data Transfer to Third Countries
sections.content: Data is not transferred outside the EU/EEA.

sections.title: 6. Age Limitation
sections.content: The application can only be used by persons aged 18 or older.
